alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cherokee, southeastern Crawford, southwestern Barton and northwestern Jasper Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 145 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cherokee, or 7 miles southwest of Pittsburg, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Carl Junction, Frontenac, Columbus, Galena, Cherokee, Weir, Lowell, Scammon, Purcell, Chicopee, Nashville, Asbury, Neck City, West Mineral, Waco, Roseland, Beulah, Riverton and Carona. This includes Interstate 49 near mile marker 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and southwestern Missouri.
